script.name: setup.cycrow.patch
script.sourceplaintext:
$page.id = 9998 set global variable: name='pageid.patch' value=$page.id load text: id=$page.id
$PATH.VERSION = 3
global comm map: set: class=TL, race=null, script=plugin.patch.comm.pack, commcheck=[TRUE] add object context entry: id='sec.music', class=Dock, icon=57, pageid=$page.id, textid=11, script=plugin.patch.menu.secmusic, type=[ObjContext.Sector]
add ship custom command: id=9600 menu=Special global script map: set: key=COMMAND_UPGRADE_FACTORY, class=TL, race=Player, script=plugin.patch.cmd.upgradefac, prio=20 set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_UPGRADE_FACTORY upgrade=[TRUE] add additional command upgrade: command=COMMAND_UPGRADE_FACTORY upgrade=Build Command Software MK3 set command menu script: command=COMMAND_UPGRADE_FACTORY, script=plugin.patch.cmd.upgradefac.menu, cmdcheck=[FALSE]
add encyclopedia custom article: Help, id='help.save', title page=$page.id, title id=1000, text page=$page.id, text id=1001 add encyclopedia custom article: Help, id='help.repair', title page=$page.id, title id=1002, text page=$page.id, text id=1003
* captial music add sector music: trackid=8100, pageid=$page.id, textid=100 add sector music: trackid=8101, pageid=$page.id, textid=101 add sector music: trackid=8604, pageid=$page.id, textid=102 add sector music: trackid=8102, pageid=$page.id, textid=103 add sector music: trackid=8106, pageid=$page.id, textid=104 add sector music: trackid=8231, pageid=$page.id, textid=117 add sector music: trackid=8511, pageid=$page.id, textid=122 add sector music: trackid=3004, pageid=$page.id, textid=128
* corporation themes add sector music: trackid=8104, pageid=$page.id, textid=105 add sector music: trackid=8203, pageid=$page.id, textid=106 add sector music: trackid=8204, pageid=$page.id, textid=107 add sector music: trackid=8212, pageid=$page.id, textid=108 add sector music: trackid=8103, pageid=$page.id, textid=109 add sector music: trackid=8207, pageid=$page.id, textid=116 add sector music: trackid=8202, pageid=$page.id, textid=125 add sector music: trackid=8224, pageid=$page.id, textid=127 add sector music: trackid=8104, pageid=$page.id, textid=129
* secondary theme add sector music: trackid=8402, pageid=$page.id, textid=110 add sector music: trackid=8603, pageid=$page.id, textid=111 add sector music: trackid=8223, pageid=$page.id, textid=118 add sector music: trackid=8230, pageid=$page.id, textid=119 add sector music: trackid=8219, pageid=$page.id, textid=120 add sector music: trackid=8222, pageid=$page.id, textid=123 add sector music: trackid=34, pageid=$page.id, textid=126
* sector music add sector music: trackid=11, pageid=$page.id, textid=130 add sector music: trackid=12, pageid=$page.id, textid=131 add sector music: trackid=13, pageid=$page.id, textid=132 add sector music: trackid=14, pageid=$page.id, textid=133 add sector music: trackid=15, pageid=$page.id, textid=134 add sector music: trackid=16, pageid=$page.id, textid=135 add sector music: trackid=17, pageid=$page.id, textid=136 add sector music: trackid=18, pageid=$page.id, textid=137 add sector music: trackid=19, pageid=$page.id, textid=138 add sector music: trackid=20, pageid=$page.id, textid=139 add sector music: trackid=21, pageid=$page.id, textid=140 add sector music: trackid=22, pageid=$page.id, textid=141 add sector music: trackid=23, pageid=$page.id, textid=142 add sector music: trackid=24, pageid=$page.id, textid=143 add sector music: trackid=25, pageid=$page.id, textid=144 add sector music: trackid=26, pageid=$page.id, textid=145 add sector music: trackid=27, pageid=$page.id, textid=146 add sector music: trackid=28, pageid=$page.id, textid=147 add sector music: trackid=29, pageid=$page.id, textid=148 add sector music: trackid=30, pageid=$page.id, textid=149 add sector music: trackid=31, pageid=$page.id, textid=150 add sector music: trackid=32, pageid=$page.id, textid=151 add sector music: trackid=33, pageid=$page.id, textid=152 add sector music: trackid=34, pageid=$page.id, textid=153 add sector music: trackid=35, pageid=$page.id, textid=154 add sector music: trackid=36, pageid=$page.id, textid=155 add sector music: trackid=37, pageid=$page.id, textid=156 add sector music: trackid=38, pageid=$page.id, textid=157 add sector music: trackid=39, pageid=$page.id, textid=158 add sector music: trackid=40, pageid=$page.id, textid=159
* other music add sector music: trackid=13, pageid=$page.id, textid=113 add sector music: trackid=14, pageid=$page.id, textid=114 add sector music: trackid=16, pageid=$page.id, textid=115 add sector music: trackid=2001, pageid=$page.id, textid=159 add sector music: trackid=2002, pageid=$page.id, textid=160 add sector music: trackid=2003, pageid=$page.id, textid=161 add sector music: trackid=2004, pageid=$page.id, textid=162 add sector music: trackid=2005, pageid=$page.id, textid=163 add sector music: trackid=2006, pageid=$page.id, textid=164 add sector music: trackid=3001, pageid=$page.id, textid=165 add sector music: trackid=6005, pageid=$page.id, textid=112 add sector music: trackid=6000, pageid=$page.id, textid=166 add sector music: trackid=6201, pageid=[Page.Sectors], textid=1020503 add sector music: trackid=8105, pageid=[Page.Sectors], textid=1020218 add sector music: trackid=8134, pageid=[Page.Sectors], textid=1020806 add sector music: trackid=8206, pageid=[Page.Sectors], textid=1020514 add sector music: trackid=8209, pageid=$page.id, textid=121 add sector music: trackid=8404, pageid=$page.id, textid=168 add sector music: trackid=8512, pageid=$page.id, textid=167 add sector music: trackid=8701, pageid=$page.id, textid=124
$gamestart.group = get game start group id if $gamestart.group == 200 $yes = create new array, arguments=[Page.Menus], 1102452, null, null, null $hints = create new array, arguments=$page.id, 200, null, null, null $no = create new array, arguments=[Page.Menus], 1102302, null, null, null $opts = create new array, arguments=$no, $hints, $yes, null, null add script selection option: name='plot.ass', pageid=$page.id, textid=500, options=$opts, default=0, callback script=plugin.patch.plotass end
* find any crates in a planet @ START [THIS] -> call script plugin.patch.fixplanetcreate :
* check if yo still have a HQ @ START [THIS] -> call script plugin.patch.checkhq :
* only run once $last.version = get global variable: name='patch.version' if ! $last.version @ $patch.data = [THIS] -> call script lib.xml.readdata : Filename='patch' Directory='Patch' Node='Patch' skip if is datatype[ $patch.data ] == DATATYPE_TABLE $patch.data = table alloc if not $patch.data['first.time'] $is.first.time = [TRUE] $patch.data['first.time'] = [TRUE] @ START [THIS] -> call script plugin.patch.plotass : Event='first.time' Value=null end @ = [THIS] -> call script lib.xml.writedata : Data=$patch.data Name='Patch' Filename='patch' Directory='Patch'
* Add the darkspace race flags remove race flags: race=Darkspace, flags=2097152 add race flags: race=Darkspace, flags=[RaceFlg.NPC]
* Set the notoriety for Darkspace to other races set notoriety of Darkspace -> Darkspace to [Notoriety.Max] points set notoriety of Darkspace -> Terran to [Notoriety.Ally] points set notoriety of Darkspace -> ATF to [Notoriety.Ally] points set notoriety of Darkspace -> Argon to [Notoriety.Enemy] points set notoriety of Darkspace -> Boron to [Notoriety.Enemy] points set notoriety of Darkspace -> Atreus to [Notoriety.Enemy] points set notoriety of Darkspace -> OTAS to [Notoriety.Enemy] points set notoriety of Darkspace -> TerraCorp to [Notoriety.Enemy] points set notoriety of Darkspace -> Split to [Notoriety.Enemy] points set notoriety of Darkspace -> Strong Arms to [Notoriety.Enemy] points set notoriety of Darkspace -> Paranid to [Notoriety.Enemy.MainSector] points set notoriety of Darkspace -> Industritech to [Notoriety.Enemy.MainSector] points set notoriety of Darkspace -> Xenon to [Notoriety.Min] points set notoriety of Darkspace -> Kha'ak to [Notoriety.Min] points set notoriety of Darkspace -> Yaki to [Notoriety.Min] points set notoriety of Darkspace -> Beryll to [Notoriety.Min] points set notoriety of Darkspace -> Teladi to 0 points set notoriety of Darkspace -> NMMC to 0 points set notoriety of Darkspace -> Pirates to 0 points set notoriety of Darkspace -> Duke's to 0 points set notoriety of Darkspace -> Goner to 0 points
set notoriety of Terran -> Darkspace to [Notoriety.Ally] points set notoriety of ATF -> Darkspace to [Notoriety.Ally] points set notoriety of Argon -> Darkspace to [Notoriety.Enemy] points set notoriety of Boron -> Darkspace to [Notoriety.Enemy] points set notoriety of Atreus -> Darkspace to [Notoriety.Enemy] points set notoriety of OTAS -> Darkspace to [Notoriety.Enemy] points set notoriety of TerraCorp -> Darkspace to [Notoriety.Enemy] points set notoriety of Split -> Darkspace to [Notoriety.Enemy] points set notoriety of Strong Arms -> Darkspace to [Notoriety.Enemy] points set notoriety of Paranid -> Darkspace to [Notoriety.Enemy.MainSector] points set notoriety of Industritech -> Darkspace to [Notoriety.Enemy.MainSector] points set notoriety of Xenon -> Darkspace to [Notoriety.Min] points set notoriety of Kha'ak -> Darkspace to [Notoriety.Min] points set notoriety of Yaki -> Darkspace to [Notoriety.Min] points set notoriety of Beryll -> Darkspace to [Notoriety.Min] points set notoriety of Teladi -> Darkspace to 0 points set notoriety of NMMC -> Darkspace to 0 points set notoriety of Pirates -> Darkspace to 0 points set notoriety of Duke's -> Darkspace to 0 points set notoriety of Goner -> Darkspace to 0 points
* Add the pandora tunings $flags = [WareType.EquipmentPack] set ware flags: ware=Pandora Tunings flags=$flags $tWares = table alloc $tWares[Engine Tuning] = 3 $tWares[Rudder Optimisation] = 3 add equipment pack: ware=Pandora Tunings replacement table=$tWares
* reset pirate relations to neutral $player.age = playing time if $player.age <= 300 $objs = get ship array: of race Pirates class/type=Ship gosub sub.ResetRelation $objs = get ship array: of race Duke's class/type=Ship gosub sub.ResetRelation $objs = get ship array: of race Yaki class/type=Ship gosub sub.ResetRelation $objs = get station array: of race Pirates class/type=Station gosub sub.ResetRelation $objs = get station array: of race Duke's class/type=Station gosub sub.ResetRelation $objs = get station array: of race Yaki class/type=Station gosub sub.ResetRelation end end
* do anything added in version 2 if $last.version < 2 end
set global variable: name='patch.version' value=$PATH.VERSION return null
sub.ResetRelation: $i = size of array $objs while $i dec $i = $o = $objs[$i] $o ->set relation against Player to Neutral end endsub return null

line.text: add encyclopedia custom article: Help, id=
add encyclopedia custom article: Help, id=

comment.var: find any crates in a planet
check if yo still have a HQ
Set the notoriety for Darkspace to other races

sval.val: find any crates in a planet
check if yo still have a HQ
Set the notoriety for Darkspace to other races
